CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, this field contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

EffectiveDate.description: The date from when the assignment of the procucer role becomes effective.

EndDate.description: The date until when the assignment of the procucer role remains effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

LineOfBusiness.description: The line of business associated with the producer split role assignment.

Name.description: The name of the producer split role assignment record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

ProducerId.description: The producer associated with the assigned role.

ProducerRole.description: The role of producer in the assignment.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The reference record associated with the assigned producer role.
